reviewText:
The storm chasers dvd was fine. DVD menu and subtitles.

I tried to play the Nature's fury and my computer and DVD player would not pull up a menu. The chapters were not in order and did not match the episodes listed on the back. I am not convinced that the DVD is the same program as "Nature's Fury". My student that needed captions was disappointed. So was I.
The two DVDs were B-day gifts for my nephew who is enthralled with anything weather-related. He has watched them several times and thanked me many times.  They were the perfect gift.
